item.description:
Ok Disc golf enthusiasts. Were heading to Top O' The Hill to toss some discs. It's a bit more challenging then out at Muldoon. I have some discs to lend and they have some free loaners. It cost only $5 to play the course. Please bring cash.

Here are some links for info and directions

http://www.dgcoursereview.com/course.php?id=4519

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Top-O-The-Hill-Disc-Golf/185615641474598

This may not be for the timid very first timers unless your up for it. It's not hard to learn.

The course is thru the woods and takes some hiking so please wear good shoes, bring bug spray and water. We will have fun !

It is dog friendly :)  ( as long as they don"t chase and bite the discs)

My phone is 603-315-0275

 *Rain will cancel this event *

So Now please RSVP if your COMING
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the trailer off the parking lot
item.name: Disc Golf
